mapper.insert: insert into purchase_table (memnum, pcnum, pcaddress, pctel, pdnum1, pdnum2, pdnum3, pdnum4, pdnum5, pdnum6, pdnum7, pdnum8, pdnum9, pdnum10) values (#{memNum}, SEQ_PURCHASE.nextval, #{pcAddress},#{pcTel}, #{pdNum1}, #{pdNum2}, #{pdNum3}, #{pdNum4}, #{pdNum5}, #{pdNum6}, #{pdNum7}, #{pdNum8}, #{pdNum9}, #{pdNum10})
